headline: Corteva (CTVA) Valuation in Focus as Company Announces Business Split and AI-Driven Crop Innovation
summary: Corteva, Inc. (CTVA) has announced a plan to split its seed and crop protection businesses into two separate public companies. This marks a major restructuring that could reshape its future. The company also revealed a new partnership with Profluent Bio, focused on using AI to drive crop innovation and sustainability. See our latest analysis for Corteva. Corteva’s decision to split its seed and crop protection units, along with its new AI-powered innovation initiative, has influenced recent...
